attributes.action: Ban the World Naked Bike Ride in UK
attributes.additional_details:
Naked rides are by rude, dirty minded and has no justification for its existence. It is disgusting that UK has fallen to such a low level that it gives a group of sick minded people with cover up reason to come out to our streets naked and not get arrested.

We must teach these sick perverted people to have some dignity instead of just backing them.
